title: Wash Your Hands!: A lighthearted guide to surviving the new global health scare
description: A lighthearted guide to surviving the new global health scare. With illustrations by Alice Starzl.  "Wash your hands like you spilt red paint and don't want the Queen of Hearts to know you've been painting the roses red."  "Wash your hands like you just made clay pots and are about to handle an expensive Persian carpet."  Disclaimer â€“ This book is not designed to replace the advice of a medical professional. It does not guarantee the reader will not contract COVID-19. It is a lighthearted way to promote the important principle of hand washing to minimalise risk to yourself and others.  Wash your hands. Be careful. But don't panic.
author: Alice Starzl
